comment: Any number ` K ` whose mod base ` N ` is divisible by a divisor ` P ` of the base is also divisible by ` P ` . This means that primes will also be relatively prime to the base when reduced ` mod N ` for any base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Mar-2014.)
